name: Rbmdns
body:
rbMDNS - ruby MPD-DBus Notify System
====================================
Homepage: http://yitsushi.github.com/rbMDNS


0x00 Dependency
  - DBus [http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/dbus]
  - MPD [http://mpd.wikia.com/wiki/Music_Player_Daemon_Wiki]
  - ruby [http://www.ruby-lang.org/]
  - ruby-dbus [https://trac.luon.net/ruby-dbus/]
  - librmpd [http://librmpd.rubyforge.org/]
  - YAML [http://ruby-doc.org/core/classes/YAML.html]

0x01 Use
  $ git clone git://github.com/Yitsushi/rbMDNS.git
  $ cd rbMDNS
  # Edit config.yml
  $ ruby rbMDNS.rb

0x02 Supported applications
  Kopete
  Pidgin

0x03 Contact
  Name: Balazs Nadasdi
  Email: yitsushi ]4T] gmail [d0T[ com
  IRC:
    - Server: irc.lacyc3.eu
    - Port: 6800  (or 6801 with SSL)
    - Channels: [ #phoenixchat , #ruby , #ruby-hu , #rails , #rails-hu ]
    - Nick: yitsushi

0x04 But how? Config? Applications? Use?
  See the wiki at http://wiki.github.com/Yitsushi/rbMDNS/
